Quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quote: Your only limit is your mind.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Shine like the whole universe is yours.
Author: Rumi

Quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Happiness is an inside job.
Author: William Arthur Ward

Quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.
Author: Hafez

Quote: Inhale courage, exhale fear.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Do more things that make you forget to check your phone.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

Quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Author: Charles R. Swindoll

Quote: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
Author: Alice Morse Earle

Quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
Author: Richard Wagner

Quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Quote: Make today amazing.
Author: Unknown

Quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Author: Peter Drucker

Quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Author: Christian D. Larson

Quote: The joy you feel when you become a giver is unmatched.
Author: Osho

Quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Your vibe attracts your tribe.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world.
Author: Buddha

Quote: Be a voice, not an echo.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Author: Walt Whitman

Quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Do more of what makes you happy.
Author: Unknown

Quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
Author: Dan Reeves

Quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
Author: Shiv Khera

Quote: Every morning brings new potential, but only if you make the most of it.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Believe in miracles, but don't depend on them.
Author: Hannelore Von Randow

Quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Author: Charles Kingsleigh

Quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
Author: Jim Rohn
